entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Norman Wells
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 33.
